desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.

desc.zh_tw: 有一天，老师从貝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往貝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和遊戲開發部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，愛麗絲就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，愛麗絲也发生了异变。

desc.en: Before the club room, Sensei found the Game Development Department was invited too. The four said they were coming to seek some inspirations, though Yuzu was pretty uncomfortable to get outside. At the club room, Hare showed everyone a strange-looking robot.

desc.zh_tw: 老师到门口时，发现遊戲開發部也受到了邀请。开发部四人表示是为了寻找灵感而来，虽然让一直待在柜子里的柚子相当不舒服。进去后，晴向众人展示了一个奇怪的机器人。

desc.en: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.
desc.jp: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.

desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯众人向大家解释，这些机器人来自千年郊外，且数量超过二十台以上。桃井等人大受震撼。貝里塔斯曾尝试使其启动但都以失败告终——就在这时，愛麗絲突然对这个东西有了反应。

desc.en: The robot, alongside Momoi's game console carrying G.Bible, started operating after interacting with Aris. All panicking, Aris suddenly announced that the "AL-1S" completed the booting, and began attacking everyone.

desc.zh_tw: 与愛麗絲接触后的机器人开始启动，而众人也发现之前装载着G.Bible的游戏机也一并启动。就在众人不知所措时，愛麗絲突然宣布“AL-1S”启动完成，并对在场众人发起攻击。

desc.en: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.

At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.

Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.zh_tw: 暴走的愛麗絲失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止愛麗絲。C&C突然现身让愛麗絲昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从綠的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。

desc.en: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.jp: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.thai: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.ko: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.zh_tw: 因未能击倒众人，愛麗絲重新充能光之剑。真紀试图阻拦，但遭愛麗絲反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因未能击倒众人，爱丽丝重新充能光之剑。真纪试图阻拦，但遭爱丽丝反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.jp: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.thai: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.ko: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了愛麗絲。就在寧瑠询问老师事情的前因后果时，綠和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在尼禄询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在妮露询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃受伤严重。

desc.en: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部抵达莉音所在的地方，在准备救出愛麗絲的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉音准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和優香出现了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和优香出现了。

desc.en: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.jp: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.

desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠成功压制季。因为身体透支，要求遊戲開發部一定要将愛麗絲带回来。遊戲開發部三人做了保证。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄成功压制时。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠成功压制季。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露成功压制时。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。

desc.en: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris could bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.jp: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris could bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.

But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉音仍然试图警告老师愛麗絲将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉音的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与陽葵的意思基本一致。千尋此时也确认了愛麗絲的具体位置，三人立刻将愛麗絲救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与日鞠的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉音仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉音的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与阳葵的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与日鞠的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: What everyone embraced was not Aris, but rather another being, which was called Key. Aris' personality was isolated in the deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and requested Sensei to leave before Key ever finished it, trying to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.

desc.zh_tw: 众人迎来的不是愛麗絲，而是一个名叫“Key”的个体。愛麗絲的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了埃里都，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉音为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，優香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.zh_tw: 在優香和乃爱的协助下，遊戲開發部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程師部和貝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、綠、柚子、老师企图在陽葵的协助下唤醒愛麗絲，于是便进入了愛麗絲的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程部和真理社等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在日鞠的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在阳葵的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程部和真理会等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃、绿、柚子、老师企图在日鞠的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。

desc.en: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.

The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_tw: 乃爱解释称，優香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。優香呵斥了莉音，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程師部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程師部干扰。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.zh_cn:

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.

She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.

desc.zh_tw: 在Key以为仍有机会时，陽葵突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉音惊讶于陽葵竟未逃走，而陽葵则表示早已对此有所预料。

desc.en: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.jp: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.

Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.

When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管愛麗絲的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将愛麗絲唤醒。至于如何唤醒，陽葵提出让遊戲開發部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回愛麗絲。莉音指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，陽葵开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，日鞠提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千禧年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，日鞠开始寻找其中的突破口。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部和老师终于遇见愛麗絲了。愛麗絲说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是愛麗絲终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部和老师终于遇见爱丽丝了。爱丽丝说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是爱丽丝终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。

desc.en: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.jp: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.

desc.zh_tw: 老师和遊戲開發部一行人来到了愛麗絲的意识深处，在那他们见到了愛麗絲与Key。开发部想要带愛麗絲回去，但Key突然出现，并重新提醒“公主”她所见到的一切。

desc.en: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.jp: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.

desc.zh_tw: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与季对峙的寧瑠、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、寧瑠负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的尼禄、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、尼禄负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的妮露、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、妮露负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲想起了莉音。愛麗絲仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和綠面对莉音时的情形，以及寧瑠前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及妮露前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。

desc.en: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.

They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井突然提到了愛麗絲与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信愛麗絲说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信愛麗絲绝非如此，强调了愛麗絲在团队中的作用。愛麗絲仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：愛麗絲自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有愛麗絲能决定。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千禧年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。

desc.en: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"

Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"

desc.zh_tw: 大家都想听听愛麗絲的真心话。愛麗絲因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。愛麗絲犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与遊戲開發部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，遊戲開發部啊！”
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家都想听听爱丽丝的真心话。爱丽丝因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。爱丽丝犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与游戏开发部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，游戏开发部啊！”

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

desc.en: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.

Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.

desc.zh_tw: 由于愛麗絲意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，埃里都控制中心也恢复正常。莉音惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是遊戲開發部所能做到的。最终，遊戲開發部三人与愛麗絲团聚。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.en: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。

desc.en: 愛麗絲剛剛接受了工程師部和貝裡塔斯的檢查，並被要求要定期來訪。貝裡塔斯沒有找到Kei的痕跡，不過愛麗絲表示，下一次見到Kei時，她會更加大力地把她打飛的。

desc.en: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.thai: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。

desc.en: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。

desc.en: 在外觀如同宇宙戰艦的「生命守護者主艦」上聚集著各個學園的學生。而且Kei警告愛麗絲遠離那艘船。

desc.en: 戰艦上的一切都讓大家感到新奇，一切都像模像樣。琳提到這艘戰艦的規模，認為可能需要大量人手共同協作才能成功，此外對其結構與執行方式尚不清晰。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en: 工程師部和遊戲開發部登上主艦。工程師部和愛麗絲一見到戰艦就興奮的喊了出來。工程師部已經迫不及待想要對其分析一番，詠葉甚至提到愛麗絲的光之劍終於能被切實地用在宇宙戰艦上了。
desc.jp: 工程師部和遊戲開發部登上主艦。工程師部和愛麗絲一見到戰艦就興奮的喊了出來。工程師部已經迫不及待想要對其分析一番，詠葉甚至提到愛麗絲的光之劍終於能被切實地用在宇宙戰艦上了。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部和游戏开发部登上主舰。工程部和爱丽丝一见到战舰就兴奋的喊了出来。工程部已经迫不及待想要对其分析一番，歌原甚至提到爱丽丝的光之剑终于能被切实地用在宇宙战舰上了。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部和游戏开发部登上主舰。工程部和爱丽丝一见到战舰就兴奋的喊了出来。工程部已经迫不及待想要对其分析一番，歌原甚至提到爱丽丝的光之剑终于能被切实地用在宇宙战舰上了。

desc.en: 優香對愛麗絲居然跟著上主艦一事感到驚訝，畢竟她可是曾經向她保證會留在千年，不過立刻招致桃井等人的不滿。優香認為千年應該是最安全的，不過乃愛則表示事情可能並不盡然。正說著話，遊戲開發部四人趁機溜走，優香瞬間慌了，而乃愛則淡淡一笑。
desc.jp: 優香對愛麗絲居然跟著上主艦一事感到驚訝，畢竟她可是曾經向她保證會留在千年，不過立刻招致桃井等人的不滿。優香認為千年應該是最安全的，不過乃愛則表示事情可能並不盡然。正說著話，遊戲開發部四人趁機溜走，優香瞬間慌了，而乃愛則淡淡一笑。

desc.zh_tw: 優香對愛麗絲居然跟著上主艦一事感到驚訝，畢竟她可是曾經向她保證會留在千年，不過立刻招致桃井等人的不滿。優香認為千年應該是最安全的，不過乃愛則表示事情可能並不盡然。正說著話，遊戲開發部四人趁機溜走，優香瞬間慌了，而乃愛則淡淡一笑。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香对爱丽丝居然跟着上主舰一事感到惊讶，毕竟她可是曾经向她保证会留在千禧年，不过立刻招致桃井等人的不满。优香认为千禧年应该是最安全的，不过诺亚则表示事情可能并不尽然。正说着话，游戏开发部四人趁机溜走，优香瞬间慌了，而诺亚则淡淡一笑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香对爱丽丝居然跟着上主舰一事感到惊讶，毕竟她可是曾经向她保证会留在千年，不过立刻招致桃井等人的不满。优香认为千年应该是最安全的，不过乃爱则表示事情可能并不尽然。正说着话，游戏开发部四人趁机溜走，优香瞬间慌了，而乃爱则淡淡一笑。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: 陽葵連線了戰艦系統，檢視到戰艦的結構，確實挺像一艘戰艦，但卻沒有發現武器或可飛行的物品。陽葵表示具體情況必須要進一步分析。

desc.en: Kei在意識中警告愛麗絲，稱對方不僅身份不明，而且還以某種方法複製了她“阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”的能力。這艘船，是遠古人民為了對抗方舟而生的，因而對她是天然的天敵，對她有著生命威脅。她希望愛麗絲能夠聽她的，儘快離開。

desc.zh_cn_jp: Kei在意识中警告爱丽丝，称对方不仅身份不明，而且还以某种方法复制了她“阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”的能力。这艘船，是远古人民为了对抗方舟而生的，因而对她是天然的天敌，对她有着生命威胁。她希望爱丽丝能够听她的，尽快离开。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 75000m的高空上，眾人突然發現方舟改變了多次元防護罩，此前所作的計算完全失效。有人立即提出減速，但綾音表示由於速度過高，撞擊不可避免。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 莉音指出方舟的保護罩不像是一種物質，更像是一種概念，而唯有符合相同概念的東西――另一個方舟，才能與之抗衡。陽葵立刻意識到莉音說的是愛麗絲，當場提出異議。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: 就在莉音和陽葵吵的不可開交之際，愛麗絲突然現身，表示理解了兩人所說的一切――作為無名諸神的王女的她，擁有著啟動另一艘方舟的能力。遊戲開發部眾人想起種種，立刻慌忙勸解愛麗絲不要做自我犧牲。但愛麗絲有自己的話，老師也制止了慌亂的大家。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在莉央和日鞠吵的不可开交之际，爱丽丝突然现身，表示理解了两人所说的一切――作为无名诸神的王女的她，拥有着启动另一艘方舟的能力。游戏开发部众人想起种种，立刻慌忙劝解爱丽丝不要做自我牺牲。但爱丽丝有自己的话，老师也制止了慌乱的大家。

desc.en: Kei清楚愛麗絲的意圖，表示如果強行重啟方舟，對她將是毀滅性的打擊，甚至可能以生命為代價。愛麗絲指出，如果那樣能幫助大家，那它就將不再是毀滅世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。愛麗絲還希望這麼做能讓莉音與陽葵和好。Kei仍然警告並表示擔憂。

desc.zh_cn_jp: Kei清楚爱丽丝的意图，表示如果强行重启方舟，对她将是毁灭性的打击，甚至可能以生命为代价。爱丽丝指出，如果那样能帮助大家，那它就将不再是毁灭世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。爱丽丝还希望这么做能让莉央与日鞠和好。Kei仍然警告并表示担忧。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.thai: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.zh_cn_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_tw: 確認今天的運勢、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: 愛麗絲向Kei抱歉，表示自己不應該逃避對她的認識，即便她們幾乎不可能互相理解。愛麗絲同情Kei作為毀滅世界的武器的感受，希望Kei能夠真正追求真實的自己，而不是照著自己可能原本並不願意的方向，就像老師對她說的那樣。愛麗絲還覺得，因為Kei是被意外唸錯的名字，這一名字的意義可以被重新定義。Kei似乎明白愛麗絲是想拯救她，而愛麗絲接受了這種解釋，並說“拯救他人，正是勇者的心意所在。”

desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝向Kei抱歉，表示自己不应该逃避对她的认识，即便她们几乎不可能互相理解。爱丽丝同情Kei作为毁灭世界的武器的感受，希望Kei能够真正追求真实的自己，而不是照着自己可能原本并不愿意的方向，就像老师对她说的那样。爱丽丝还觉得，因为Kei是被意外念错的名字，这一名字的意义可以被重新定义。Kei似乎明白爱丽丝是想拯救她，而爱丽丝接受了这种解释，并说“拯救他人，正是勇者的心意所在。”

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.en: Kei啟動了協議，開始準備方舟的生成。眾人本以為Kei又佔據了愛麗絲的意識，但愛麗絲在一瞬間又變回了原樣。莉音驚訝於愛麗絲竟能設法讓Kei“服從”她，但愛麗絲糾正說，是她“接受”了請求。愛麗絲想要藉助會長的力量，同時希望能見她一面。

desc.zh_cn_jp: Kei启动了协议，开始准备方舟的生成。众人本以为Kei又占据了爱丽丝的意识，但爱丽丝在一瞬间又变回了原样。莉央惊讶于爱丽丝竟能设法让Kei“服从”她，但爱丽丝纠正说，是她“接受”了请求。爱丽丝想要借助会长的力量，同时希望能见她一面。

desc.en: 莉音用自己的小機器人將自己的全息影像投射到艦橋上，與愛麗絲交流。莉音對愛麗絲表示抱歉，但有些難以開口；愛麗絲表示感謝，指出莉音已經成為她的同伴；莉音有些驚詫，但愛麗絲表示敵人變朋友的故事可是相當常見。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.en: 藍天上，電光火石之間，愛麗絲以自己的光之劍為原型，改變了生命守護者號。在資料的深處，Kei終於將“王女”尊稱為“愛麗絲”，認可了這一名字的正當性。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。

desc.en: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.jp: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……

desc.zh_tw: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。日鞠指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉央的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。阳葵指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉音的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。日鞠指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉央的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 優香、佳世子與亞子報告愛麗絲的光之劍發射出極高的能量，並正直直向方舟飛去，瞄準誤差可忽略不計。
desc.jp: 優香、佳世子與亞子報告愛麗絲的光之劍發射出極高的能量，並正直直向方舟飛去，瞄準誤差可忽略不計。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: 另一方面，愛麗絲則突然倒地。優香和陽葵有些驚訝，遊戲開發部則表示愛麗絲並無大礙並已經轉移。
desc.jp: 另一方面，愛麗絲則突然倒地。優香和陽葵有些驚訝，遊戲開發部則表示愛麗絲並無大礙並已經轉移。

desc.en: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 聽到此種讚賞，莉音突然情緒崩潰，離開了通訊，自己在某處辦公室的桌子下抱著頭。
desc.jp: 聽到此種讚賞，莉音突然情緒崩潰，離開了通訊，自己在某處辦公室的桌子下抱著頭。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 听到此种赞赏，莉央突然情绪崩溃，离开了通讯，自己在某处办公室的桌子下抱着头。

desc.en: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.jp: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.thai: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.ko: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.zh_tw: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Kei与爱丽丝回到了最一开始她们被找到的那个废墟里。爱丽丝向Kei告别，随后倒地失去意识――但被Kei及时搂住。Kei这时完全理解了爱丽丝的“勇者”与“勇气”究竟为何物，并以自己，一个武器，的消失作为代价，救回了爱丽丝；自己却变成了一个小机器人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Kei与爱丽丝回到了最一开始她们被找到的那个废墟里。爱丽丝向Kei告别，随后倒地失去意识――但被Kei及时搂住。Kei这时完全理解了爱丽丝的“勇者”与“勇气”究竟为何物，并以自己，一个武器，的消失作为代价，救回了爱丽丝；自己却变成了一个小机器人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: Kei与爱丽丝回到了最一开始她们被找到的那个废墟里。爱丽丝向Kei告别，随后倒地失去意识――但被Kei及时搂住。Kei这时完全理解了爱丽丝的“勇者”与“勇气”究竟为何物，并以自己，一个武器，的消失作为代价，救回了爱丽丝；自己却变成了一个小机器人。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。
desc.zh_tw: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
